benchmark_details.name: MUD (Modern UI Dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: MUD is a large-scale and noise-filtered dataset for modern style UI modeling, comprising 18,000 human-annotated UIs collected from 3,300 apps.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a high-quality dataset for UI modeling that reflects modern design standards.

data.source: Collected from popular Android apps using automated app exploration techniques.
data.annotation: Human annotation for validation of UI quality.

methodology.calculation: Performance metrics calculated based on the accuracy of UI element detection and retrieval tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher AP indicates better performance in detecting UI elements.
methodology.baseline_results: Compared to the Rico dataset, MUD demonstrated a 10.5% improvement in average precision.
methodology.validation: Manual validation of the collected UIs to ensure data quality.
